Package io.anserini.collection

Code for reading document collections.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MultifieldSourceDocument  
    SourceDocument
    A raw document from a collection.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CarCollection
    A document collection for the TREC Complex Answer Retrieval (CAR) Track.
    CarCollection.Document
    A document from a collection for the TREC Complex Answer Retrieval (CAR) Track.
    CarCollection.Segment
    An individual file in CarCollection.
    ClueWeb09Collection
    An instance of the ClueWeb09 collection.
    ClueWeb09Collection.Document
    A document from the ClueWeb09 collection.
    ClueWeb09Collection.Segment
    An individual WARC in the ClueWeb09 collection.
    ClueWeb09DocumentTest  
    ClueWeb12Collection
    An instance of the ClueWeb12 collection.
    ClueWeb12Collection.Document
    A document from the ClueWeb12 collection.
    ClueWeb12Collection.Segment
    An individual WARC in the ClueWeb12 collection.
    ClueWeb12DocumentTest  
    CoreCollection
    A document collection in the CORE Dataset format of research outputs.
    CoreCollection.Document
    A document in a JSON collection.
    CoreCollection.Segment
    A file in a JSON collection, typically containing multiple documents.
    CoreDocumentTest  
    DocumentCollection<T extends SourceDocument>
    A static collection of documents, comprised of one or more FileSegments.
    DocumentTest  
    FileSegment<T extends SourceDocument>
    Base implementation for a FileSegment.
    HtmlCollection
    A collection of HTML documents.
    HtmlCollection.Document
    A generic document in HtmlCollection.
    HtmlCollection.Segment
    An individual file in HtmlCollection.
    HtmlCollectionTest  
    JsonCollection
    A JSON document collection.
    JsonCollection.Document
    A document in a JSON collection.
    JsonCollection.Segment
    A file in a JSON collection, typically containing multiple documents.
    JsonDocumentArrayTest  
    JsonDocumentObjectTest  
    JsonLineObjectTest  
    NewYorkTimesCollection
    An instance of the New York Times Annotated Corpus.
    NewYorkTimesCollection.Document
    A document from the New York Times Annotated Corpus.
    NewYorkTimesCollection.Parser
    Parser for a document from New York Times Annotated Corpus.
    NewYorkTimesCollection.RawDocument
    Raw container class for a document from New York Times Annotated Corpus.
    NewYorkTimesCollection.Segment
    An individual file from the New York Times Annotated Corpus.
    NewYorkTimesDocumentTest  
    TrecCollection
    A classic TREC ad hoc document collection.
    TrecCollection.Document
    A document in a classic TREC ad hoc document collection.
    TrecCollection.Segment<T extends TrecCollection.Document>
    A file in a classic TREC ad hoc document collection, typically containing multiple documents.
    TrecDocumentTest  
    TrecwebCollection
    A classic TREC web collection (e.g., Gov2).
    TrecwebCollection.Document
    A document from a classic TREC web collection (e.g., Gov2).
    TrecwebCollection.Segment<T extends TrecwebCollection.Document>
    A file in a TREC web collection (e.g., Gov2), typically containing multiple documents.
    TrecwebDocumentTest  
    TweetCollection
    A collection of tweets.
    TweetCollection.Document
    A tweet (i.e., status).
    TweetCollection.Document.TweetObject
    Used internally by Jackson for JSON parsing.
    TweetCollection.Document.TweetObject.Coordinates
    Used internally by Jackson for JSON parsing.
    TweetCollection.Document.TweetObject.Delete
    Used internally by Jackson for JSON parsing.
    TweetCollection.Document.TweetObject.RetweetedStatus
    Used internally by Jackson for JSON parsing.
    TweetCollection.Document.TweetObject.User
    Used internally by Jackson for JSON parsing.
    TweetCollection.Segment
    A file containing multiple tweets.
    TweetDocumentTest  
    WashingtonPostCollection
    An instance of the TREC Washington Post Corpus.
    WashingtonPostCollection.Document
    A document from the TREC Washington Post Corpus.
    WashingtonPostCollection.Document.WashingtonPostObject
    Used internally by Jackson for JSON parsing.
    WashingtonPostCollection.Document.WashingtonPostObject.Content
    Used internally by Jackson for JSON parsing.
    WashingtonPostCollection.Document.WashingtonPostObject.ContentJsonDeserializer
    Used internally by Jackson for JSON parsing.
    WashingtonPostCollection.Segment
    A file containing multiple documents from the TREC Washington Post Corpus.
    WashingtonPostDocumentTest  
    WikipediaArticleTest  
    WikipediaCollection
    A Wikipedia collection.
    WikipediaCollection.Document
    A Wikipedia article.
    WikipediaCollection.Segment
    A collection of Wikipedia articles (note that Wikipedia dumps are distributed as a single file).
